title: 14 day ban for no reason.

embed.description: I would like to discuss this ban with someone besides JENNY711, I feel JENNY711 to be very biased in this case and not even taking the time to listen with this ticket, JENNY711 repeated the same thing 3 times, there is definitely something wrong with this ban, how can I get banned with no proof?

body: I have recently gotten a 14 day ban for making threats in-game, I have never made threats ever while playing league, there is no proof to back up their claim, as there is no chat logs, it simply says, "We can't display chat logs for this punishment right now. Contact Player Support for more detailed info". I have tried to contact support, but every time JENNY711 is in charge of my ticket and doesn't even read it, just copy and paste the same message, JENNY711 didn't supply me with proof to my reason of ban, this has made me believe this ban was unjust.

replies.body: i have, look at the video
Thats just a regular ticket. Support has a live chat feature. Think the hours are 1pm-9pm pacific time
I have tried to make a live ticket during those hours, but it just makes a regular support ticket
Hmmmm I dunno then. Did you try on a weekend? Maybe they arent there on the weekends
that may be the reason, as the ban happened on saturday, I will try to make a live one on monday afternoon, thanks for the help!

Ok, listen.
Ask the support agent for your chat logs and what you said wrong.
i made like 5 support tickets trying to ask for the proof, but ill try again
